description: This file sets up an AI agent with specific tools and configurations, then requests a report comparing two stocks.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent configured with a model, tools, and instructions.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: Represents an OpenAI chat model used by the agent.

classes.name: YFinanceTools
classes.description: Provides financial data tools such as stock prices and company info.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Outputs the agent's response, optionally streaming the output.
